alert.note: Alert for Benson; Cavalier; Eddy; Griggs; Nelson; Ramsey; Towner; Western Walsh County (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: High Wind Watch issued November 05 at 10:37PM CST until November 06 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM TO 9 AM CST SUNDAY... ...HIGH WIND WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM CST SUNDAY THROUGH SUNDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...For the Wind Advisory, west winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 45 mph expected. For the High Wind Watch, west winds 35 to 40 mph with gusts up to 60 mph possible. * WHERE...Towner, Cavalier, Benson, Ramsey, Eddy, Nelson, Griggs and Western Walsh Counties. * WHEN...For the Wind Advisory, from 3 AM to 9 AM CST Sunday. For the High Wind Watch, from Sunday morning through Sunday afternoon. * IMPACTS...High winds may move loose debris, damage property and cause power outages. Travel could be difficult especially for high profile vehicles. Blowing dust or dirt may result in localized visibility restrictions, especially near finely tilled fields. Finally, hunters should think twice about venturing out on any ponds or lakes.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.

area.areaDesc: Benson; Cavalier; Eddy; Griggs; Nelson; Ramsey; Towner; Western Walsh County
